bingo.lobby.card_generation.from_seed.in: %s to receieve the command for setting the seed. Add the numeric seed at the very end of the command.
bingo.lobby.card_generation.from_seed.ex: The seed determines which items generate on the card and where you spawn. You can use this for competitive races using the same seed.
bingo.got_bingo.diag.top_left: [%s] %s got a bingo from top left to bottom right!
bingo.got_bingo.diag.bottom_left: [%s] %s got a bingo from bottom left to top right!
bingo.got_bingo.double.col_row: [%s] %s got a double bingo in row %s and col %s!
bingo.got_bingo.double.col_diag.top_left: [%s] %s got a double bingo in col %s and from top left to bottom right!
bingo.got_bingo.double.col_diag.bottom_l: [%s] %s got a double bingo in col %s and from bottom left to top right!
bingo.got_bingo.double.row_diag.top_left: [%s] %s got a double bingo in row %s and from top left to bottom right!
bingo.got_bingo.double.row_diag.bottom_l: [%s] %s got a double bingo in row %s and from bottom left to top right!
bingo.got_bingo.double.diags: [%s] %s got a double bingo in both diagonals!
bingo.got_bingo.triple.top_left: [%s] %s got a triple bingo in col %s, row %s and from top left to bottom right!
bingo.got_bingo.triple.bottom_left: [%s] %s got a triple bingo in col %s, row %s and from bottom left to top right!
bingo.got_bingo.triple.col_diags: [%s] %s got a triple bingo in col %s and both diagonals!
bingo.got_bingo.triple.row_diags: [%s] %s got a triple bingo in row %s and both diagonals!
